ERROR_ROLES_NOT_BELOW1: All given roles have to be below me
ERROR_ROLES_NOT_BELOW2: None of the given roles can be managed

ERROR_BUTTONROLE_SWITCH_SAME_ROLE: You can't remove and add the same role

ERROR_EMOJI_INACCESSIBLE: At least one emoji is invalid or inaccessable to me
ERROR_COMMAND_OUTSIDE_GUILD: You can only use commands in guilds

ERROR_EXTERNAL_LINK_NEW: That's not a valid link from this server (new)

ERROR_EMBED_MORE_THAN_ONE: Adding more than one embed is not supported

ERROR_EPHEMERAL_AND_CHANNEL: You can't make the message ephemeral when also have a channel selected

ERROR_DMS_CLOSED: The member has their DMs closed
ERROR_CANT_SEND_TO_THIS_CHANNEL: I'm not able to send a message to that channel
ERROR_CANT_SEND_TO_THAT_CHANNEL: I'm missing permissions to send messages in the channel the message is in
ERROR_CANT_SEND_TO_THiS_CHANNEL_CHECK: I'm not able to send a message to that channel so I can't check

INFO_DESCRIPTION:
SlashBot is a new innovative bot with useful slash commands that replaces ReactionRoles with a simpler UI and user friendly notes.
Get started by setting up a ButtonRole or a DropdownRole setup by typing `/buttonrole` or `/dropdownroles`!

**Useful Links**
[Support Server]({0}) **|** [Recommended Invite]({1}) **|** [Bot Page]({2}) **|** [Website]({3}) **|** [Patreon]({4})
[Contribute to Localization]({5})

DROPDOWNROLES_EDIT_ROLES_INSTRUCTIONS:
Please send a message with the following format:
```md
@{0} <role> <emoji> <label>
<description>
<required roles>
```
`- ` A label can be any text less than 100 characters
`- ` An emoji can be any emoji or none
`- ` Between the role, emoji and label and the description a newline has to exist
`- ` Required role being a role the member needs to select this option
DROPDOWNROLES_ADVANCED_ROLES_INSTRUCTION:
Please send the next messages with the following format:
```md
@{0} <role> <emoji> <label>
<description>
<required roles>
```
`- ` A label can be any text less than 100 characters
`- ` An emoji can be any emoji or `none`
`- ` Maximum 25 roles
`- ` Between the role, emoji and label and the description a newline has to exist
`- ` Required roles being a set of roles which the member needs 1 of to get the role (max 4)

Send `done` to finish or `cancel` to cancel
BUTTONROLES_ADVANCED_ROLES_INSTRUCTION:
Please send the next messages with the following format:
```md
@{0} <role> <mode> <style> <emoji> <label>
<required role>```
`- ` [The style must be a number between 1 and 4](https://discord.com/assets/7bb017ce52cfd6575e21c058feb3883b.png)
<:empty:708946760277688363>`- ` **{1}**: Primary
<:empty:708946760277688363>`- ` **{2}**: Secondary
<:empty:708946760277688363>`- ` **{3}**: Success
<:empty:708946760277688363>`- ` **{4}**: Destructive
`- ` The mode must be a one of the following
<:empty:708946760277688363>`- ` **toggle**: Allows adding and removing
<:empty:708946760277688363>`- ` **add**: Allows only adding
<:empty:708946760277688363>`- ` **remove**: Allows only removing
`- ` A label **or** emoji must be provided
`- ` A label can be any text less than 100 characters or none
`- ` An emoji can be any emoji, `default` or `none`
`- ` Maximum 25 roles
`- ` There must be a newline before the required role
`- ` The role required to use the button
Send `done` to finish or `cancel` to cancel
DROPDOWNROLES_DESCRIPTION:
Click the buttons below to add/remove an option

Make sure to follow the requirements below:
`- ` A label can be any text less than 100 characters
`- ` An emoji can be any emoji, an ID or `none`
`- ` Required roles being a set of roles which the member needs 1 of to get the role (max 4)

You can see a select-menu below with the roles you already gave
DROPDOWNROLES_ADVANCED_MODAL_ROLE_PLACEH: @mention, the id or the name of the role
DROPDOWNROLES_ADVANCED_MODAL_ROLE_LABEL: The role you want to add as an option
DROPDOWNROLES_ADVANCED_MODAL_RESTRICTION: @mention, the ids or the names of the required roles
Roles needed to select the option

DROPDOWNROLES_EDIT_ROLES_REMOVED: Removed role <@&{0}> from the DropdownRoles setup in row {1} on [this message]({2})
DROPDOWNROLES_EDIT_SELECT_OPTION: Select the option you want to remove
DROPDOWNROLES_EDIT_INVALID_DROPDOWN: You can't remove any more options from this dropdown
DROPDOWNROLES_EDIT_APPEARANCE_MAX_ROLES: Please set your max_roles to something equal or lower than the options count
